Package dev.schoolmanagement.service

Interface BaseService<T>

Type Parameters:
T - generic type for implementing sub-classes.
All Known Subinterfaces:
CourseService, InstructorService, StudentService
All Known Implementing Classes:
CourseServiceImpl, InstructorServiceImpl, StudentServiceImpl
public interface BaseService<T>
Base service interface for basic crud operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    deleteById​(long id)
    Deletes the persistent entity from database by it is ID, throws EntityNotFoundException if the entity is non-existent.
    List<T>
    findAll()
    Retrieves all persisted data of the type T without pagination or sorting.
    T
    findById​(long id)
    Retrieves the Optional type of entity with the associated ID and converts it to the corresponding data transfer object by using its mapper class.
    T
    save​(T t)
    Basic persist operation which takes a generic type of object and returns the peristed data if it is successfull.
    default T
    update​(T t)
    Update operation on a persistent entity.

  • Method Details

    • save

      T save​(T t)
      Basic persist operation which takes a generic type of object and returns the peristed data if it is successfull.
      Parameters:
      t - object to be persisted.
      Returns:
      the persisted object.

    • findAll

      List<T> findAll()
      Retrieves all persisted data of the type T without pagination or sorting. Might return empty list if the associated table is empty.
      Returns:
      List of the retrieved objects.

    • findById

      T findById​(long id)
      Retrieves the Optional type of entity with the associated ID and converts it to the corresponding data transfer object by using its mapper class. Throws EntityNotFoundException if the entity is non-existent.
      Parameters:
      id - of the desired entity.
      Returns:
      DTO of the retrieved entity.

    • deleteById

      default void deleteById​(long id)
      Deletes the persistent entity from database by it is ID, throws EntityNotFoundException if the entity is non-existent.
      Parameters:
      id - of the desired entity.

    • update

      default T update​(T t)
      Update operation on a persistent entity. First checks if there is a entity associated, if not throws EntityNotFoundException .
      Parameters:
      t - object with updated fields.
      Returns:
      updated object.
